intro: Neoarytera, commonly known as the silverleaf nightshade, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Solanaceae family, which includes other well-known plants like tomatoes and peppers. The plant is characterized by its small, white or pale blue flowers and silver-tipped leaves. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often growing in rocky soils. Due to its toxic properties, it is generally avoided by livestock and humans.
